metadata.title: CVE-2020-15078 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: OpenVPN 2.5.1 and earlier versions allows a remote attackers to bypass authentication and access control channel data on servers configured with deferred authentication, which can be used to potentially trigger further information leaks.

criterions.comment: openvpn package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1ubuntu1.1').
